hackathon-eligibility: 1) children under the age of 16 must either be accompanied by a parent/guardian or have explicit, written permission from them in order to participate
hackathon-requirements:

hackathon-rules:
1. We're all in this together; let's treat each other as such.
2. Teams may have up to 5 people.
3. You must participate in the event in person to be eligible for prizing.
4. If you're coding, fresh code only, please.
5. Abide by the 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: First Place - £20K towards developing your idea
Second Place - £15K towards developing your idea

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=30 Aylesbury St, Clerkenwell, London EC1R, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How much will this affect and improve the lives of the individual, the community, the world?
How inventive or clever is the idea; how close to the sun did they fly?
How well does this fit into the lives of users?
How effective and well-packaged is the presentation, the idea, the team?

hackathon-location-address: 30 Aylesbury St, Clerkenwell, London EC1R, UK
hackathon-description-header: Join us: calling all female developers, designers, engineers, project managers, and others who want to boost the self-esteem and body confidence of girls everywhere!
